name: Sudoku Takeout Lite
description:
Free for a limited time. Sudoku Takeout Lite is designed specifically for the iPad to provide the ultimate Sudoku experience. The lite version is fully functional and a great way to enjoy Sudoku. The lite version only has easy level puzzles and does not include color tiles or auto mark.

Lite Features
• Designed specifically for iPad
• 30 Easy puzzles
• Customizable
• Score board
• Games saved automatically
• Undo support
• Puzzles have only one solution
• No ads

We hope that you'll enjoy the lite version so much you'll upgrade to the full version which includes:
• Easy, Medium, Hard and Evil difficulty levels
• Play with numbers or colors
• Auto mark
• Thousands of puzzles
